<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/apps/{id}/rotate-secret"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to rotate the secret of a set of credentials in your Port organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"The `id` of the credentials set you want to operate on."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
